model_answer: The correct answer is C: [00:00:33 - 00:01:26]. The video clip shows a forest stream with a hand pointing toward where to work next at approximately 00:00:33. It also mentions that the speaker hasn't had much success apart from mushrooms and has come back to this spot, indicating that this is the last time he can officially dig and sluice.

The answer is A: [00:03:27 - 00:05:04]. The man can be heard saying 'See what we get here' at 00:03:27, followed by a joke about finding lead at 00:03:29, and then mentioning he found something like a prawn that he could use in an omelette but would return it at 00:03:42. This is the part where a close-up shot of a gold nugget caught on the black mesh pan is shown.
